name: Perfect Slices: CUT IT !
description:
Cut the fruits with your knife skill! Show that you’re the best chef with the best knife work that never misses. Cook the food and unlock new veggies or fruits. This is a cool, simple, but very addictive game that you shouldn’t miss.

How to chop or slice? Simple tap down and hold it when you have to chop the fruits. Lift your finger to raise the knife. Careful not to chop of blocks or spikes that will dull your knife and make it harder to slice the fruits like a ninja.

Everyone hates food prep when cooking, especially chopping, slicing, and peeling veggies and fruits. But chopping can be fun too, especially if you don’t have to worry that you will lose your finger when you slice fruits and vegetables. Slicing and chopping are also great for practice your knife skill. Every chef needs to have a very good knife skill. We simplify the process of food prepping on our app to make this game a lot more fun for kids and adult!

=== FEATURES OF PERFECT SLICE FRUIT - CUT IT! ===

• Tap and hold the screen to chop the fruits and veggies.
• Don’t cut the blocks or other items.
• Unlock new types of fruits and veggies after a new level.
• Get three stars for all levels.
• Get the highest score by perfecting your chopping
• Unlimited play for FREE
• Relaxing game for every one.
• Colorful, fun illustrations.
• Get new kitchen knives and even the ones that look like ninja knife!

Our game has no objectionable content so it’s great for kids to play! It also doesn’t require reading or math skills so kids of all ages can play.

You’ll never know how much you’re going to like our game before you try it. So why not try our slicing game now? This game is for everyone, old or young, gamer or non gamer. After playing lots of casual game, maybe you will look for something new to play. This is a fun, addicting game that will hook you up with the first try. Why? It’s fun, simple, and so satisfying! You are tired from work, study, and other activities. You aren’t keen on laboring on hard or complex games. So you need something simpler, but also addictive.

There’s something very cathartic when you see the veggies and fruits getting chopped and sliced neatly with simple gesture. However, since this is a game, there is also a challenge. You need to keep your timing right and chop as many vegetables as you can. There is a limit of how many fruits you need to chop. If you go below that limit then you fail the level. The game will be a lot harder and challenging when you move on to later levels. You will never gues that such a simple game can be so challenging!

---

This fruit chopping game is FREE! There are ads to keep this game going, but we also need your favor. Please give us your best review and rating for this game on Appstore. By reviewing Perfect Slice Fruit, you help us to get discovered by other users.
